summary: Guards will continue to use the armor for their respective Hold, regardless of what side controls it.
descriptionHtml:
After a Hold is taken in the vanilla game, the original guards are replaced by ones that wore Legion or Stormcloak armor.  Since I wanted the new guards to also use the guard armor for their respective Holds, I went into the Creation Kit and changed that.  After I finished, I decided to upload it here in case anyone else felt the way I do.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2463779-1407310314.png[/img]

With this installed, after a Hold switches sides, you will now see Imperial or Stormcloak Guards (depending on the side you chose) who will still have the Hold armor and shields.

Please note that the only testing I've done is in playing through normally, and I have only used this while fighting for the Stormcloaks.  All guards are supposed to use Hold Guard armor, so if you see any that aren't, please let me know where you saw them so I can fix them.  However, please confirm that it isn't a soldier who is meant to be using that armor (no guards should look like soldiers with this mod installed).

- Thanks to jayr848 for adding a link to this on one of his mod pages.

[u][size=3]Suggested Mods:
[/size][/u][list][*][size=2][u][/u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54212/?][u]Extra Guards[/u] by jayr848[/url]: As the name suggests, this adds many more guards across Skyrim, including in places that don't have guards at all.  I recommend installing this one only after the Civil War is over.  When I tried this, I kept getting bounties since the new guards literally stand in the middle of the battlefield, and I kept hitting them by accident.  If you use this mod, I also recommend installing the Extra Guards Patch, which you can find in the Files tab.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][/u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25868/?][u]Stormcloaks with Sleeves[/u] by frank zunge:[/url] Gives Stormcloak Armor and all Hold Guard armors sleeves.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][/u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43493/?][u]Hold Border Banners[/u] by Thicketford:[/url] Adds banners on roads when they cross the border between Holds.[/size][/*]
[/list]
author: terickson30

files.name: Hold Guards Keep Armor
files.changelogHtml: - Imperial jail guards in Riften still used Imperial armor (Thanks to jayr848 for pointing this out.)

files.name: Hold Guards Keep Armor
files.changelogHtml: - Two guards outside General Tullius' HQ in Castle Dour (Solitude) were named "Solitude Guard" but wore Legion armor. They have been renamed "Imperial Soldier."

files.name: Hold Guards Keep Armor
files.changelogHtml:
- Guards during Siege of Whiterun were named "Whiterun Guard," are now "Whiterun City Guard"
- Windhelm Jail Guard for the Stormcloaks and Morthal Jail Guard for the Imperials didn't carry their respective jail keys (thanks to Andzz for pointing this out)

files.name: Hold Guards Keep Armor
files.changelogHtml: - Many of the guards for Palace of the Kings in Windhelm were named "Windhelm City Guard," and have been renamed to "Windhelm Palace Guard."

files.name: Extra Guards Patch
files.changelogHtml: - Many of the guards for Palace of the Kings in Windhelm were named "Windhelm City Guard," and have been renamed to "Windhelm Palace Guard."
